meaningMnemonic: The place you <kanji>wait</kanji> to <kanji>join</kanji> other people is a <vocabulary>waiting room</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>meeting place</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings, but it's like the hiragana that normally sticks out is stuffed in. 待ち → 待, 合い → 合 and is pronounced the same too. I know it's confusing, but once you get it down you'll never forget!
